title: Drift
shortDescription: Live chat for sales, powered by AI.
longDescription:
Drift uses messaging and artificial intelligence to catch the leads that are falling through the cracks in your sales funnel.

Let’s face it: People are tired of filling out lead capture forms and having to wait for follow-up emails and phone calls. That’s not how people communicate anymore, and that’s not how they want to buy.
Today, billions of people around the world are using messaging apps to communicate in real-time. And with Drift, you can bring that same experience to your sales process.
After installing Drift, you’ll be able to engage with leads when they’re at their most interested -- while they’re live on your website. And using our intelligent bots, you can capture and qualify leads 24/7, even when all of your sales reps are asleep. 

With Drift, our bots automate all of the tedious tasks (e.g. routing chats to the right departments and reps, booking meetings, and answering help desk questions) so your team can focus on building relationships and closing deals. 

And with our Android and iOS apps, you can respond to messages and get real-time push notifications when target leads are live on your site -- that way you never miss an opportunity to chat.
Learn more at Drift.com.
author: Drift Inc.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: For individuals. The basic version of Drift for people wanting to chat with their website visitors.
products.longDescription:
- 100 Contacts
- $18 per additional seat
- Live Chat (Manual Online & Offline)
- Email Fallback
- iOS and Android Apps
- Individual Profiles & Scheduling
- Slack integration

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: + Unlimited chats per day
products.longDescription: Unlimited chats!

products.title: Cloudflare Promo
products.shortDescription: Special Plan for Cloudflare customers - Get more contacts than our normal free plan.
products.longDescription:
- 1000 Contacts
- $18 per additional seat
- Live Chat (Manual Online & Offline)
- Email Fallback
- iOS and Android Apps
- Individual Profiles & Scheduling
- Slack integration

products.title: Small Business
products.shortDescription: For small businesses that are ready to take a step up from the free plan and send targeted messages to their website visitors.
products.longDescription:
For small businesses that are ready to take a step up from the free plan and send targeted messages to their website visitors.

- Start with 1,000 Contacts
- $18 per additional seat
- Campaigns
- Targeting
- Block IP address
- Scheduled Hours
- Enriched Data
- HubSpot, Segment, Zapier integrations
- Saved Replies

categories.title: Grow Your Email List
categories.description: Apps to help you grow your email subscribers.

categories.title: Make Money On Your Site
categories.description: Apps to help you make money from your website.

categories.title: Get More Customers
categories.description: Apps to help you grow your customer base.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

proposedApp.title: Drift
proposedApp.shortDescription: Drift makes it easy for your customers to buy.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Drift uses messaging and artificial intelligence to catch the leads that are falling through the cracks in your sales funnel.

Let’s face it: People are tired of filling out lead capture forms and having to wait for follow-up emails and phone calls. That’s not how people communicate anymore, and that’s not how they want to buy.
Today, billions of people around the world are using messaging apps to communicate in real-time. And with Drift, you can bring that same experience to your sales process.
After installing Drift, you’ll be able to engage with leads when they’re at their most interested -- while they’re live on your website. And using our intelligent bots, you can capture and qualify leads 24/7, even when all of your sales reps are asleep. 

With Drift, our bots automate all of the tedious tasks (e.g. routing chats to the right departments and reps, booking meetings, and answering help desk questions) so your team can focus on building relationships and closing deals. 

And with our Android and iOS apps, you can respond to messages and get real-time push notifications when target leads are live on your site -- that way you never miss an opportunity to chat.
Learn more at Drift.com.
proposedApp.author: Driftt Inc.

proposedApp.title: Drift
proposedApp.shortDescription: Drift makes it easy for your customers to buy.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Drift uses messaging and artificial intelligence to catch the leads that are falling through the cracks in your sales funnel.

Let’s face it: People are tired of filling out lead capture forms and having to wait for follow-up emails and phone calls. That’s not how people communicate anymore, and that’s not how they want to buy.
Today, billions of people around the world are using messaging apps to communicate in real-time. And with Drift, you can bring that same experience to your sales process.
After installing Drift, you’ll be able to engage with leads when they’re at their most interested -- while they’re live on your website. And using our intelligent bots, you can capture and qualify leads 24/7, even when all of your sales reps are asleep. 

With Drift, our bots automate all of the tedious tasks (e.g. routing chats to the right departments and reps, booking meetings, and answering help desk questions) so your team can focus on building relationships and closing deals. 

And with our Android and iOS apps, you can respond to messages and get real-time push notifications when target leads are live on your site -- that way you never miss an opportunity to chat.
Learn more at Drift.com.
proposedApp.author: Drift Inc.

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: For individuals. The basic version of Drift for people wanting to chat with their website visitors.
products.longDescription:
- 100 Contacts
- $18 per additional seat
- Live Chat (Manual Online & Offline)
- Email Fallback
- iOS and Android Apps
- Individual Profiles & Scheduling
- Slack integration

products.title: Pro
products.shortDescription: + Unlimited chats per day
products.longDescription: Unlimited chats!

products.title: Cloudflare Promo
products.shortDescription: Special Plan for Cloudflare customers - Get more contacts than our normal free plan.
products.longDescription:
- 1000 Contacts
- $18 per additional seat
- Live Chat (Manual Online & Offline)
- Email Fallback
- iOS and Android Apps
- Individual Profiles & Scheduling
- Slack integration

products.title: Small Business
products.shortDescription: For small businesses that are ready to take a step up from the free plan and send targeted messages to their website visitors.
products.longDescription:
For small businesses that are ready to take a step up from the free plan and send targeted messages to their website visitors.

- Start with 1,000 Contacts
- $18 per additional seat
- Campaigns
- Targeting
- Block IP address
- Scheduled Hours
- Enriched Data
- HubSpot, Segment, Zapier integrations
- Saved Replies
